member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.ConsoleLifetimeOptions.SuppressStatusMessages
member.summary: Indicates if host lifetime status messages should be supressed such as on startup. The default is false.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Host
member.summary: Provides convenience methods for creating instances of with pre-configured defaults.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Host.CreateDefaultBuilder
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with pre-configured defaults.
member.remarks:
The following defaults are applied to the returned :
set the to the result of
load host from "DOTNET_" prefixed environment variables
load app from 'appsettings.json' and 'appsettings.[].json'
load app from User Secrets when is 'Development' using the entry assembly
load app from environment variables
configure the to log to the console, debug, and event source output
enables scope validation on the dependency injection container when is 'Development'
member.returns: The initialized .

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Host.CreateDefaultBuilder(System.String[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with pre-configured defaults.
member.remarks:
The following defaults are applied to the returned :
set the to the result of
load host from "DOTNET_" prefixed environment variables
load host from supplied command line args
load app from 'appsettings.json' and 'appsettings.[].json'
load app from User Secrets when is 'Development' using the entry assembly
load app from environment variables
load app from supplied command line args
configure the to log to the console, debug, and event source output
enables scope validation on the dependency injection container when is 'Development'
member.returns: The initialized .

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.HostingHostBuilderExtensions.UseConsoleLifetime(Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.IHostBuilder)
member.summary: Listens for Ctrl+C or SIGTERM and calls to start the shutdown process. This will unblock extensions like RunAsync and WaitForShutdownAsync.
member.returns: The same instance of the for chaining.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.HostingHostBuilderExtensions.RunConsoleAsync(Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.IHostBuilder,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Enables console support, builds and starts the host, and waits for Ctrl+C or SIGTERM to shut down.
member.param: A that can be used to cancel the console.
member.returns: A that only completes when the token is triggeredor shutdown is triggered.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.HostOptions
member.summary: Options for

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.HostOptions.ShutdownTimeout
member.summary: The default timeout for .

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Internal.ApplicationLifetime
member.summary: Allows consumers to perform cleanup during a graceful shutdown.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Internal.ApplicationLifetime.ApplicationStarted
member.summary: Triggered when the application host has fully started and is about to wait for a graceful shutdown.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Internal.ApplicationLifetime.ApplicationStopping
member.summary: Triggered when the application host is performing a graceful shutdown. Request may still be in flight. Shutdown will block until this event completes.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Internal.ApplicationLifetime.ApplicationStopped
member.summary: Triggered when the application host is performing a graceful shutdown. All requests should be complete at this point. Shutdown will block until this event completes.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Internal.ApplicationLifetime.StopApplication
member.summary: Signals the ApplicationStopping event and blocks until it completes.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Internal.ApplicationLifetime.NotifyStarted
member.summary: Signals the ApplicationStarted event and blocks until it completes.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Internal.ApplicationLifetime.NotifyStopped
member.summary: Signals the ApplicationStopped event and blocks until it completes.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Internal.ConsoleLifetime
member.summary: Listens for Ctrl+C or SIGTERM and initiates shutdown.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Internal.HostingEnvironment
member.summary: This API supports infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. This API may change or be removed in future releases.
